trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, (for example, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter" />).
trans-unit.target: Uma classe abstrata usada como uma classe base para outros formatadores (por exemplo, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter" />).

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é abstrata e não pode ser instanciada diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to write.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> a gravar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> com a instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> must have a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> deve ter um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> can then write out the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> pode, em seguida, escrever o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> para um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> is by using this constructor.
trans-unit.target: A única maneira de associar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> com um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> usando este construtor.

trans-unit.source: An XML reader to check.
trans-unit.target: Um leitor XML a ser verificado.

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid syndication item.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificado contém um item de sindicalização válido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the XML reader contains a valid syndication item, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se o leitor de XML contiver um item de sindicalização válido, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> used to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> usado para criar o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> usando a instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: Recém-criado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> instância não é adicionada automaticamente para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância usada para criá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: Recém-criado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância não é adicionada automaticamente para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instância usada para criá-lo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to use to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> a ser usado para criar o novo <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: Recém-criado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink> instância não é adicionada automaticamente para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância usada para criá-lo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance used to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> usada para criar a nova instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> com a instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: Recém-criado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson> instância não é adicionada automaticamente para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância usada para criá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associated with the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associado ao formatador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associated with the formatter.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associado com o formatador.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> is associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> by passing in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> está associado a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> passando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> de instância para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Loads element extensions.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as extensões de elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> no qual as extensões de elemento serão carregadas.

trans-unit.target: O tamanho máximo permitido para uma extensão de elemento (em bytes).

trans-unit.source: The RSS 2.0 and Atom 1.0 specifications allow you to add custom element extensions to a syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: As especificações de RSS 2.0 e Atom 1.0 permitem que você adicionar extensões de elemento personalizado a um feed de distribuição.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to read in these element extensions from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que você ler essas extensões de elemento de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.

trans-unit.target: XML inválido encontrado durante a leitura.

trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: Reads in a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Lê em um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>, associates it with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> and reads the feed into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>, associa-o com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> e lê o feed no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Associates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: Associa uma instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected and cannot be called from user code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é protegido e não pode ser chamado do código do usuário.

trans-unit.source: To associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>, either create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instance and pass the constructor a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance or load a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.
trans-unit.target: Para associar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância com um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>, crie uma nova <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instância e passar o construtor um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância ou carregar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.
